Blog.post: U fucking god!!!u like to me miserable right!?will u ever stop giving misery that u gave me,and nw u giving me another 1....FUCK WHAT THE HELL U TRY TO PROVE HERE!?I LOVE SHASHA THTS FINAL!!!U GIVING ME MISERY...Y?WHY CAN'T I AND SHASHA HAVE A HEALTHY RELATIONSHIP WITHOUT ARGUING OR ANGRY AT EACH OTHER?WHY CAN'T WE BE LIKE ANY OTHER NORMAL COUPLES?WHAT THE FUCK U TRY ING TO PROVE?SO U GOT THE POWER THEN U WANT SHASHA TO SUFFER?I DUN GIVE A FUCK IF I SUFFER...BUT SHASHA...AND INNOCENT LIVE U TALKIN ABT HERE!!!WAT THE HELL?DO U KNOW HW MUCH I LOVE SHASHA?HAH!?DO U KNOW?WHY CAN'T U JUZ STOP PESTERING MY LOVE LIFE AND MAKING IT WORST BY THE MINUTE?HAH!?WHY!?WHY THE FUCK U DOING THIS TO SHASHA?IF U WANT TO BLAME ME,U FUCKING WRONG U HORE!I DID NOT MSG ANY OF THOSE BITCHES...AND YET Y U MADE HER HEART SAID I DID MSG THOSE BITCHES!?WHAT THE FUCK U WANT WITH ME?SEEING ME IN THIS SITUATION,U LOVE IT RITE?U LOVE IT!!!FUCK YOU!!!WAIT FOR 1 DAY...1 DAY...U FUCKING HORE PISS OF JERK GOD!!!

Today,my mission to skool is,to tell my teacher in charge tht i wanted to quit skool...which i've think long and i think should be my best way to solve my problems...I know if i gonna continue this course,there is nothing to come out with..Hey i'm in ITE wat the hell can i do when i grow up?electronics?what the hell i was thinkin...waste my life...i continue study tis course becoz of my love....Love some1...i love her soo much tht she was the one who encourage and motivates me to study and studyy...i was thinkin abt quitin...but when i found her,she showed be 1 whole new me...Even i myself i dun believe tat was me...Her presence in my life totally change my life...Mann if not for her,i dun think tht i'm here writting this blogg...I should be out there being a nuisence...Be like those matripens out there...blonde hair,pierce here and there and dun mention tatoo... K let me tell u,blogg a quick rewind of my history...I went in ITE,i was those hack care dun care...i made firends within dayz...so after a few weeks,i found this guy who called himself Neng he was the 1 who teach me the wayz of life of a matripens...1st i was like yea yea whatever...he keep physcoing me so i was eaten by his words and be came 1 of the matripens...i dun really have a life back then,when they said,"bro,hari ni kite naik lori tau!"i agrees without thinkin...like i said no life nuting to loose...then 1 fine day,i found her...Shasha...it started funny of course...i was askin abt my "bro" found tiz gal at Hendrix Bar called shasha some where on march being she is the only 1,so i asked her did she went and stuff...i found shasha was bck then during december...then i got closed to her,the closer i get wit her,the futher i went from my bros...i can simply i dun care abt my bros unlike i used to...closer and closer we be came lovers...i love her,she love me...its like my love towards my bros nw change to her...my bros?hah!dun care tht much...so the closer we get,she asked me to quit being matripens...and i did finally...then...i continued my love...then it comes this day where i had a big fight against my closest "bro"...Fucking heaven...lucky there is always her to confort me and giving me advises....so the story continues,although we always fight,quarrel and cry for each other,we are juz meant to be together so we did nt get seperated that far...quarrel² then we will get back together...so we always get back with each other...then slowly she change the way i think...believe this,from a guy tht i used to be,dun care hack care and dun have a life,she changed me to be a guy tht have a life,though i used her as a pilar to lean on...well she wasn't liked my other gals,who juz like easy going and some juz dun quite care abt me as thier guy...well i tot tht was love...so when i found her i apply tht to her...she give me a hell of a scholding...hahahahahaha....mann i still can remember tht time...i was soo scared for the very 1st time...hahahahaha...so i change myself...i took time though to change my old self to a new 1...i was thinkin,"mann tis is true love...i know tht i is never i experience this be4.a girl who care abt me.took care of my well being.i know this should be my girl.my dream girl.i tot there was no girl like her in this world."till today right tis moment i love her sooo much...she is nw my life...the air tht i breath...the love tht i need its all her...she is the 1 who showers me wit love...she is the 1 girl and 1 person i cared and love sooo much....till today...i won't leave her...i know tht i'm true to my heart...if she don't believe wat i had to say,i dun want to force her to trust me coz i know tht wouldn't be nice istead i would find a way to make her see the fact tht i'm tellin the truth... So at 8am+ i did gave her a msg to let her know tht i'm gonna quit skool and start to find werk..after the msg,i did called my old employee Sebastian who is in charge at airport...thinkin i might got the job so i gave him a call guess what he said to me,"no no no...i dun have any vacancy...u want,go find other job,dun find me...i asked u ar last time u really want to find dun care any time also can...then u ar said cannot last minute...if i gt job vacancy also i dun want to employ u ar... fuck!hw rude is he?shit!early in the mornin got a scholdin...nah its my fault i guess...so may be i buy the newspaper later and see any vacancy...so i came in the class,sat dwn...listen to my beloved teacher blaberin for the last time...after he stop blabering,i went to see him and say to my teacher in charge tht i want to quit from skool coz i have no intrest and have no point to skool any more...without thinkin he said no...wow!wat a suprise?!he asked me what the hell i was thinkin...i juz kept saying tht i want to quit the skool by hook or by crook...so the teacher rejected...FINE!i sat dwn and think wat ways to quit skool humm i was thinkin of nt comin skool and act like i had quit skool...juz pretend tht nothing happen..so at 12 i was on my way home when she gave me a msg after like 1 day and a half askin me nt to quit skool....i was felt soo weak when i saw tht msg...so i did sat at a nearest void deck to read all the msgs and thinking wat is the best solution was i skool,werk then spend time with her on the phone then go to sleep so tht she would see the fact tht i'm not lying to her in any ways...but she juz keep saying no to all my suggestion to werk...to me this is my only way tht will make she believe in me...tht i'm tellin her the truth...i juz can't understand y?to me this is my only way to make she believe me once more...i want tht trust bck...i want to earn it...if i juz keep quiet won't she still suspect me of doing such thing?i know i didn't do it...i dun want to juz keep quiet and she beeing hurt this way...i love her soo much...if i had to sacrifice my life for her,i will....i'm not in wrong...i did not msg any of those bitches...and she is still don't trust me...i dun know y...if i did,i will admit...tis is a fault tht i didn't do it...so i want her to understand me...if i werk,i didn't meant anything...it is juz a reason for she to trust me...i know its hard but wat can i do?i love u and dun want u to hurt this way... i really love her...i really do love her...i dun want to lose her in any way...i really do...why this fucking god making my life miserable?what the fuck i did wrong to u,god?u want to have this fight agin huh?!to start all over again?hey,luckly there is she ard...if nt fer her,i would still against u!!!u want to see it again huh?!HEY FUCK,LET ME TELL U THIS...I LOVE HER...I LOVE HER SOO MUCH...SHE CHANGE MY MINDSET COMPLETELY...SHE MADE ME BELIEVE IN U!!!IF SHE'S NOT HERE,TO FUCK I'M GONNA BE WITH U!!!I WANT U TO CHANGE MY FATE THIS INSTANCE!!!HEY U THINK U'RE THE MIGHTY 1 U CAN DO WAT EVER U LIKE!?HEY I LOVE HER...I LOVE HER SOOO MUCH AND WHY I HAD THIS IN RETURN?I BELIEVE IN U AGAIN...AND THIS IS HW U REPAY ME? urlLink pent urlLink

mann...wat a hell ride for me today...from the time at 1.57am till nw no calls or msg.... mann...it starts when i screw all of her stuff at blogg tht was urlLink http://sexybabyshasha.blogspot.com i was trying to up load her song...then i went to view to see her blogg,then the song that i load did nt play,so i went back to edit her template then i realise everything gone missing...what the hell did i do?shit!then i tried explain every thing when she told me,"da la u tak guna"mann i really hurt my feeling sia...what can i say comin from a gal tht i love so much and see high abt her?she actually said tht?mann who the hell am i she said me like tht?god damn i'm her guy...mann i juz was totally pissed off and so damn sad...to think of it,do i really mean anything to her?does she love me?i can't say more,coz the more i say and think abt this,my tears just keep rolling dwn my cheeks...i can smile can keep cool but deep dwn my heart no1 knows tht hw much i love her and that thing she said?i feel the pain...the pain tht i never felt be4...then when she asked me to up load her song again,wat do u think i feel?i juz asked her to copy n paste it...after wat she said?then she started to get upset...was it my fault?then i apologize to her,sayin tht i'm sorry...she did nt replie...till 3am+ i check,she was out...so wat i did was,i try to make up to her...my putting her favourite song...and express my freeing towards her in mail hopefully she replie... At 4.15pm,i check my mail,there was no response...then i check her blogg,she juz updated at 10am+...humm i was relief to see tht msg...but when i read it,most of it,its abt suzy...nah its alright with me i know abt tht story...so the futher i read the blogg,the futher i read abt boi_ska...mann wat a pain...she type,"Boi_Ska aka Rafiiiii just to tell u Im sorry of tis few days..Sha bz werking BEBEY*.....i hope you takmo get the wrd idea abt tis bloggg.......I will delete apa yg tak patut ok...nanti I put in pic A² yg lain if i get a chance to amment all the content.......sorryyyyyy BEBEY..For walwal thanx for changing my fav song.i appreciate tat!!!" bebey*=wat the hell she meant by tht?who tell hell is he to her?then who theam i to her?what does she meant by tht...?and look...she juz say thankx onli thts all?nothing more then tht?wat is this? then i was thinkin to upload my gallery pics at am when i saw 2 Sticky Notes,1 Virtual kiss...the Stick Notes was from her,she said tht she do not trust me anymore coz i recieve Virtual kiss from some gal by the nick of shasha sacek?who the hell...?strange...i had never S.N ppl or even sent V.K to any1...wat hell?ever since i put her pic,gals juz keep comin to me although i did not even S.N or V.K to them!!!wat is tis?Nw from my point of view nt that i jumpin into conclusion but this Boi_Ska is juz a stupid,motherfuckin busted who juz wanna steals her from me...ahh!!!dasar pencuri.... fuck...should i listen to wat my mom always said..."Never put ur 100% love towards a gal coz u will never know it might turn out.If only she is ur wife or ur fiance,only then u can give ur fully 100% heart to her"-my mom...i tot tht was crap...nw i think it might be true...but i'm juz a hard headed... FUCK TO ALL THE PEEP WHO WANT TO SAY ABT ME...COZ I DUN GIVE A FUCK TO U MOTHERFUCKERS FOR WHAT U WANNA FUCK ABT!!!I KNOW I LOVE HER,I LOVE SHASHA SO MUCH SO?!?!! mann...i dun know abt her as fer me,i gt my gal,i express my feelin towards her...coz nw i dun trust F.R.I.E.N.D.S or B.R.O.T.H.E.R.H.O.O.D coz all will turn out sour...i gt long history abt this...anyway,wat i care n trust is my gal...without her,where can i turn to?where can i relie on or putting my hopes on?without her,i dun know wat is gonna happen to me...Nw i juz need someone,something juz to cheer me up...juz need u to talk to...hizz.... why in life must we face this challanges?i juz couldn't understand...Nw i juz don't know wat to do...May be i can juz go and fucking rot my self since no1 cares abt me....nt even my only faithful shasha...i dunno...i think i'll stop here only...the more i type,the more my heart is gonna be in pain,the more i gonna be in pain,the more my tears keep rolling dwn my cheek...i dun know why...why can she do this to me...?why is she doin tis to me...?who is tht ska boi towards her?am i jealous?
